title: Leather Cloth
description: 3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Blue warp. .25-.50\" White, tan & lt. tan leather and/or vinyl weft and olive green spacing weft between. Note paperclipped to face: \"this one.\" mounted on black 8.5 x 11\" card with 99.1.1012. (blue, tan & white)
